name: Baking Time!
description:
Do you love baking? Whether you're a baking novice or a seasoned pro, Baking Time is the perfect game for you. The ultimate bakery game that will satisfy your cooking fever and love for baking!

In this fun-filled game, you'll get to make all kinds of delicious baked goods, from croissants to cookies and everything in between. With automated baking processes, you can sit back and watch as your goodies rise and bake to perfection.

But the real fun begins when you start serving your baked goods to your customers! With a steady stream of hungry customers waiting in line, it's up to you to deliver their orders quickly and efficiently. And with each satisfied customer, you'll earn money that you can use to hire additional staff and expand your bakery to include new setups and products.

But that's not all - Baking Time is a merge and dig game, which means you'll have to strategically merge and dig your way through various challenges and obstacles to reach your baking goals. And with each successful merge, you'll unlock new recipes and ingredients that you can use to create even more delicious treats.

With its vivid and colorful graphics, addictive gameplay, and endless baking possibilities, you'll be hooked from the very first bake. So what are you waiting for? Grab your apron and get ready to bake up a storm in Baking Time!

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app
